mapper.select: SELECT UM.USER_SEQ as user_seq, UM.USER_ID as user_id, UM.USER_PASSWD as user_passwd, UM.USER_NAME as user_name, UM.IMG_SEQ as img_seq, UM.USER_STATE as user_state, UM.KAKAO_USER_YN AS kakao_user_yn, TO_CHAR(UM.USER_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mm:ss') as user_reg_date, IMG.FILE_PY_NAME as file_py_name FROM USER_MEMBER UM LEFT OUTER JOIN IMAGE IMG ON UM.IMG_SEQ = IMG.IMG_SEQ WHERE UM.USER_SEQ != 0

SELECT UM.USER_SEQ as user_seq, UM.USER_ID as user_id, UM.USER_PASSWD as user_passwd, UM.USER_NAME as user_name, UM.IMG_SEQ as img_seq, UM.USER_STATE as user_state, UM.KAKAO_USER_YN AS kakao_user_yn, TO_CHAR(UM.USER_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mm:ss') as user_reg_date, IMG.FILE_PY_NAME as file_py_name FROM USER_MEMBER UM LEFT OUTER JOIN IMAGE IMG ON UM.IMG_SEQ = IMG.IMG_SEQ WHERE UM.USER_SEQ != 0 AND( UPPER( UM.USER_ID ) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchContent}) || '%' OR UPPER( UM.USER_NAME ) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchContent}) || '%' )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{user_name}, USER_STATE = #{user_state} WHERE USER_SEQ = #{user_seq}
